selectedVerses.text: my soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning, more than watchmen for the morning.
Be patient, therefore, brothers, until the coming of the Lord. See how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth, being patient about it, until it receives the early and the late rains.
Blessed is he who waits and arrives at the 1,335 days.
The eye of the adulterer also waits for the twilight, saying, 'No eye will see me'; and he veils his face.
Our soul waits for the LORD; he is our help and our shield.
